page.title: 19KIRKMOOR NURSERY,KIRKCOWAN
page.content: Since 1932 Mr Smith's family have owned the {Nursery}in the middle of the village .On {2 acres}he produces { {vegetables}and{flowers}for planting in gardens in spring.In large greenhouses he grows {tomatoes}and flowers for planting out .He buys seeds from various firms,sows them in greenhouses and when they are still quite small he sets them outside to get used to the cold before people buy them for their gardens.Some of the flowers produced are made into {wreaths}for funerals.Others are made into { {bouquets}.At Christmas he makes wreaths out of holly which he obtains at Mochrum Park.The Nursery is open { {seven days}a week.
